```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)

```


```{r}
glimpse(wiki_hot_100s)
```

```{r}

```

```{r}
x <- wiki_hot_100s |>
    as_tibble(wiki_hot_100s)

```

```{r}

x <- x |>
    select(artist) |>
    group_by(artist) |>
    summarize(artist_freq = n()) |>
    arrange(desc(artist_freq)) |>
    head(10)

```
